name: assignment-tracker-mcp-client
description: A comprehensive assignment tracking application with AI integration and MCP server architecture

scripts.install-all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../mcp_server && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python main.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"

author: Alice AI MCP Client
